database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - Topobiographical molecular analysis of human skin
entry.description:
mzXML files of MS/MS data for skin swab samples taken from 2 human subjects. Additionally, beauty products, chemical standards, cosmetic ingredients, human cells, and microbe extracts are also included.
All data was used in conjunction with the the grouping file in methods and protocols to create a molecular network available at gnps.ucsd.edu.
Under results, it is the network created and packaged in cytoscape.
